          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="es">Repaso de la historia de Roma</string>
            <string language="en">Revision of Roman history</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Änderung der römischen Geschichte</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Révision de l'histoire romaine</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Revisão do history roman</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Revisione di storia romana</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αναθεώρηση της ρωμαϊκής ιστορίας</string>
          </title>
          <language>es</language>
          <description>
            <string language="es">Actividad en la que se deben asociar personajes inscritos en cajas en movimiento con hechos históricos relevantes.</string>
            <string language="en">Activity in which the students must match Roman names in moving boxes with relevant historic events.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">Roma</string>
            <string language="en">Rome</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">historia</string>
            <string language="en">history</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <value>collection</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Aktivität, in der die Kursteilnehmer römische 
Namen in beweglichen Kästen mit relevanten historischen Fällen 
zusammenbringen müssen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Activité dans laquelle les étudiants doivent 
apparier les noms romains dans des cadres mobiles avec des 
événements historiques appropriés.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Atividade em que os estudantes devem combinar os 
nomes roman em umas caixas moventes com os eventos historic 
relevantes.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Attività in cui gli allievi devono abbinare i 
nomi romani in caselle commoventi con gli eventi storici relativi.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Δραστηριότητα στην οποία οι σπουδαστές πρέπει να 
ταιριάξουν με τα ρωμαϊκά ονόματα στην κίνηση των κιβωτίων τα 
σχετικά ιστορικά γεγονότα.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Rom</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Geschichte</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Rome</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">histoire</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Roma</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ιστορία</string>
          </keyword>
